mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM culture WHERE codename = #{codename} AND title = #{title} AND date = #{date}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO culture (title, date, codename, guname, place, use_trgt, use_fee, start_date, log, lat, is_free, hmpg_addr, score) VALUES (#{title}, #{date}, #{codename}, #{guname}, #{place}, #{useTrgt}, #{useFee}, #{startDate}, #{log}, #{lat}, #{isFree}, #{hmpgAddr}, #{score})
INSERT INTO liked_shows (member_id, culture_codename, culture_title, culture_date) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{cultureCodename}, #{cultureTitle}, #{cultureDate})
